quest.name: Back to the Drawing Board
journal:
 Quest Sync
Mogek seems to be fixated on your tool belt.

The Mogmenders are restoring an abandoned crafting facility in the Rookery, and Mogek would enlist the aid of his favorite artisan. He bids you seek out his moogle workers to learn what work there is to be done.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.

You speak with a moogle who tells you of how man and dragon once used the Rookery in the past, and how the Mogmenders are committed to restoring its crafting facilities. Unfortunately, he has no tasks befitting one of your skills. He suggests speaking with his partner, who has been taking note of what needs to be fixed or replaced in the Rookery.

You find a moogle lamenting piles of rusted machinery once used for cutting fabric. He intends to salvage what he can from them, and asks you to craft components for their eventual replacements. Completed works should then be taken to his helpmeet.

※In the event you lose the materials or the synthesis ends in failure, you may try again by speaking with the miffed moogle.
The helpmeet moogle seems lost in thought when you approach, pleasantly surprised by your delivery of new components. All that remains is to inform Mogek that your work is complete.
Mogek is glad to see you return so quickly. Grateful for your contributions to the Mogmenders' work, he is certain these crafting facilities will be of great use in the future.
objectives: Synthesize the shearing machine components.Deliver the shearing machine components to the helpmeet moogle.

dialogue.name: MOGEK
dialogue.text: Did you know the landlords of old built a crafting facility at the Rookery? At least that's what the dragons have told me. What a time to be alive that must have been, kupo!

dialogue.name: MOGEK
dialogue.text: There is much to be gained by having such a place to work, which is why I've set the Mogmenders to work scouring the area for salvageable equipment. I'm sure their work would go faster with your help.

dialogue.name: MOGEK
dialogue.text: As to specifically how you can assist, you'll have to speak with the Mogmenders to see what still needs fixing.

dialogue.name: CRAFTSMOOGLE02304
dialogue.text: You must be that master artisan I've heard so much about, kupo! Welcome, welcome!

dialogue.name: CRAFTSMOOGLE02304
dialogue.text: Here on this very spot─or rather, down the stairs there near those dreadful wyverns─landlords astride skylords would descend from on high. Such transport was possible thanks to special equipment made here in the Rookery.

dialogue.name: CRAFTSMOOGLE02304
dialogue.text: The facilities that produced this equipment have fallen into disarray from centuries of neglect, but never fear. When we finish here they will be good as new, kupo!

dialogue.name: CRAFTSMOOGLE02304
dialogue.text: Though, your talents would be wasted on the few tasks I have at present. Hmmm. Perhaps you should speak with my fellow Mogmender. He's conducted a rather thorough survey of the grounds and should know what is most in need of repair.

dialogue.name: CRAFTSMOOGLE02304
dialogue.text: I have no jobs worthy of your skill, but I'm certain my companion just over yonder will have a task or three for you, kupo.

dialogue.name: WORKUNDERMOOGLE02304
dialogue.text: So many parts, so little time. What are we to do, kupo?

dialogue.name: RECEIPTMOOGLE02304
dialogue.text: The Rookery is truly a sight to behold. Or at least, it will be when we finish, kupo!

dialogue.name: WORKUNDERMOOGLE02304
dialogue.text: Come for work, have you? Well you're in luck, kupo! I have checked every nook and cranny of the Rookery, and let me tell you, I would much rather build the whole thing from scratch than repair what the landlords left behind.

dialogue.name: WORKUNDERMOOGLE02304
dialogue.text: At present, I'm working on a few old fabric-shearing machines. Nothing but lumps of rust if you ask me. I can try to salvage pieces from them, but I need you to fashion a new set of blades.

dialogue.name: WORKUNDERMOOGLE02304
dialogue.text: At present, I'm working on a few old fabric-shearing machines. Nothing but lumps of rust if you ask me. I can try to salvage pieces from them, but I need you to fashion components for a new roller.

dialogue.name: WORKUNDERMOOGLE02304
dialogue.text: At present, I'm working on a few old fabric-shearing machines. Nothing but lumps of rust if you ask me. I can try to salvage pieces from them, but I need you to whip up some grease for the gears.

dialogue.name: WORKUNDERMOOGLE02304
dialogue.text: If you're lacking materials, you need only ask. When you've finished, take what you have to my assistant.

dialogue.name: WORKUNDERMOOGLE02304
dialogue.text: No need to be shy. I'm here to help, kupo! Just let me know if there's anything else you need.

dialogue.name: WORKUNDERMOOGLE02304
dialogue.text: You've finished? Splendid! Hurry over to my assistant and deliver those parts. One less task on his list should brighten his day.

dialogue.name: RECEIPTMOOGLE02304
dialogue.text: Hm? What's that about the shearing machines?

dialogue.name: RECEIPTMOOGLE02304
dialogue.text: New parts! Kupopopo! We could do well to have a few more workers like you around. Many thanks, friend.

dialogue.name: WORKUNDERMOOGLE02304
dialogue.text: We've still a long way to go, but mark my words: the landlords of old would be jealous if they could see what we have planned, kupo!

dialogue.name: CRAFTSMOOGLE02304
dialogue.text: <sigh> What I wouldn't give to see the Rookery as it once was.

dialogue.name: RECEIPTMOOGLE02304
dialogue.text: Step by step, stone by stone. That's how we'll get the job done.

dialogue.name: MOGEK
dialogue.text: Back so soon? If only the others could work with such haste. Then again, recreating equipment from a thousand years ago is no small feat.

dialogue.name: MOGEK
dialogue.text: It will be worth it in the end, though. Those facilities will soon be of great use in our work. I can feel it in my pom, kupo!
